bibl.title: Territory of Washington V. Wilson D. Coyle. Motion to Elect from Indictment
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: In the district court of this Fourth Judicial District holding terms at Cheney
The Territory of Washington vs. Willis D. Coyle Defendant No. 1535

Comes now the said defendant Willis D. Coyle and were the court to require the said Territory to elect an to which one of the serial offenses clayout in the indictment herein it will rely upon on the trial of this course - Whether this assault and battery clayout - the assault with a deadly weapon with intent to do bodily harm no considerable provocation appearing, or like assault under circumstances holding a wilful malignant and abandoned heart. W.H. Smallwood John B Allen & Foster & Thoughton attys for def
Territory of Washington - vs - Willis D. Coyle
Filed May 1st 85 Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk By R. Strobach Deputy
